description.value:
A shaman who selects the slums spirit gains the city’s alleys and avenues as steadfast allies. The rats in the gutter, the torches along the walls, the coins that flow through the market are all a part of her and serve her whim.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{Charm Person} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vxi9c3xwa83xthka]{Summon Swarm} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.78kwl5t99j9e8tzh]{Hold Person} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{Confusion} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l83djt5019ujasjh]{Wall Of Stone} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.446vcsetq4ny904e]{Mislead} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uddlhatt6uq4e5yf]{Hold Person, Mass} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hi72gh3dlf7a1qyt]{Maze} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.esia6azb5g68tfs7]{Imprisonment} (9th)

Spirit Animal: The shaman’s spirit animal looks like a leaner version of its species, with hungry eyes and a wiry frame. It gains a +4 bonus on initiative checks.
